text:
I just tried sampling:

http://www.jajakarta.org/index.html.ja.sjis

Unfortunately this displays garbled for me both in the test and reading from the file, no doubt because my Java installation does not support Japanese.

Can you check that the "Sampler Result" tab contents are the same for you in both cases.

I get the following for that page:
